name: UFO on Tape: First Contac‪t‬
description:
What would you do if a real UFO descended from the clouds? Run screaming? Or grab your iPhone and start recording?!

Exclusive to Apple Arcade, 'UFO on Tape' puts you in the hot seat as you speed through the countryside looking for evidence of visitors from outer space.

The highly anticipated sequel to the multi-award winning 2010 iOS classic. It's 'out of this world!'
